subject: Attention Dear beneficiary,
body:
SUPREME COURT OF UNITED STATES.
1600 Pennsylvania Avenue NW Washington DC 20500. USA.


Attention Dear beneficiary,

I humbly ask you to give me your attention and hear me well. I sent
you this message before and you don't listin to me,

I am Hon John Glover Roberts Jr, Chief Justice of the Supreme Court of
United States.

I want to inform you that the matter of your fund was brought to my
desk this on Friday last week, Because the Chairman, Chief Executive
Capital Bank USA Mr.Scott Brannan said that they will divert your
funds which worth a sum of of $46.5 Million Us Dollars to Government
Treasuries Account.

However. I asked Mr.Scott Brannan what happened and he said that you
refused to pay the sum of US$350 to obtain Affidavit of claim
Ownership which will declare your $46.5 Million Us Dollars free from
any money laundry and terrorism drug money sponsor activities.

I have kindly understand that the US$350 fee might be too much for you
to pay now, So i make things easier for you by discussed with the
Mr.Scott Brannan President and CEO. Capital Bank USA on your behalf to
give you the grace of sending US$200 only. after the Diplomatic Agent
deliver your ATM Package then he will follow you to any ATM Machine
Center around you so you withdraw money from your ATM Visa Card and
then balance him $150 before proceeding back to his my official duty
Post in the States.

NOTE: Every documentation proof for your fund have been packaged and
seal to be delivery together with your Visa ATM Card to your address.
I have been in this office for years and have helped a lot of people
as well, This is an opportunity for you to receive your Visa ATM Card
NOW!. I will advice that you adhere to my instruction to meet up and
buy the $200 iTunes Card or ebay card , Furthermore, you are advised
to reconfirm below information as your current and direct contact to
avoid wrongful delivery.

i. Identification Name:
ii. Current home address:
iii. Direct phone Number(s):
iv. Scan Copy of Your Identification

You are hereby advised to purchase $200 by ebay card or I Tunes card
scratch it and attached the picture for your own good,

My dear, this is the last opportunity you have to comply to receive
your ATM package Worth of US$46. 5 Million United State Dollars to
your designated address, but remember that after (3 DAYS) you did not
make the payment then I will sign the document and divert your funds
to the US Government Treasury.

Treat with urgency ,

Yours Faithfully,

Mr. John Glover Roberts Jr
CHIEF JUSTICE OF THE SUPREME COURT OF UNITED STATES.

subject: Re: Attention Dear beneficiary,
body:
Hello Mr. John Glover Roberts Jr,

Wow, this is quite a surprise! I never thought I'd receive an email from the Chief Justice of the Supreme Court of the United States. It's an honor to be in contact with you.

I'm a bit confused about some parts of your message though. You mentioned something about my funds being diverted to Government Treasuries Account? Could you please explain more about that? 

Also, you mentioned a sum of US Million Dollars and an ATM Visa Card. Is this some kind of prize or reward? How did I become eligible for such a large amount?

And lastly, you asked me to purchase an ebay card or Tunes card and scratch it and attach the picture. What is the purpose of this?

I'm sorry for all these questions but as you can imagine, this is all very new and surprising to me.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Dear Beneficiary.
body:
Office of Mr. Charles Washington Miller
Honorable United States of America Patriots Act
Federal Executive Council Washington DC USA
Dated February 28, 2024


Dear Beneficiary.


I am Mr.Charles Washington Miller,Honorable United States of America
Patriots Act,Federal Executive Council Washington DC USA, Dated
28th.02,2024,Appointed by the President Mr. Joe Biden,with the advice
and consent of the Senate this is to notify you that I Mr.Charles
Washington Miller,Honorable United States of America Patriots Act,wish
to validates about your compensation funds worth total sum of
USD$38,000,000,00,still inconclusive and according to the information
i received here they stated that you disclaim your compensation funds,
and my purposely of writing below underline massive is to know if you
still have more interest to claims,because,the United States of
America,is seek my signature support on the documents for easy
confiscation of your compensation fund to the government budget
account, since you don't want to receive it, but with the experience
in the Government i refused to sign the documents,until i had from the
original beneficiary of the funds,if is truth that owner refused as
the reported.

However,due to humanitarian ground and sympathy,I immediately called
up the President Mr.Joe Biden and Chief Justice of the Supreme Court
of United States and explained your case to them, as regards to your
payment (USD$38,000,000,00,)Thirty Five Million United State Dollars,
and they personally called the board of prestige to diverted reference
USD$38,000,000,00,to United States of America Patriots Act Federal
Executive Council Washington DC USA,which they did,right now your
stated mentioned fund,is right now with USA Patriots Act,in order to
help you obtain the USA Tax Claims Certificate,which cost sum of
$250.00, so that by the time your funds gets to you, no authority will
questions the funds as it has been legally certified free from all
financial Malpractices and facets,because,all the documents would
going to obtained here in United States of America Patriots Act.

Basically about the USD$38,000,000,00 (Thirty Five Million United
State Dollars, is a compensation fund from USA Government,since 28 Oct
2022,your E-mail address was generated through the computer ballot
system as one of the selected victim to receive this compensation
fund,you are required to send the fee of US$250.00, only, where your
transaction originated as stated below,you will ever pay before your
funds leaves our office here is the US$250.00,to use it obtained the
USA Tax Claims Certificate,and you will never pay dime again as agreed
and signed down here in Court that you will never pay any other money
apart from the US$250.00.

To this end it will interest you to know that every and any
fee/charges required has been reduced to only the sum of US$250.00 us
dollars,this step is in order to enable you afford this only fee, so
that your USA Tax Claims Certificate,will procure in your name to
enhance the immediate transfer of your $38.000,000,00 (Thirty Eight
Million United State Dollars) into your bank account or ATM Master
Card, will be delivered to your home address,Depending on the choice
you wants to receive your money, and every other documentation proof
for your funds have been packaged and seal to be transfer with your
funds.

Please, I want you to know that you have few days to effect the
required payment, so we can clear release and effect the transfer of
your fund worth $38.000,000.00,into your account, Therefore, the days
of you being subjected to paying twice Double Payment is over as that
is the case with some corrupt officials down here in the states
.Thanks for adhering to this instructions which are meant for your
sole benefit, once again accept my congratulations in advance. Thanks
for your cooperation as your quick response to this email notice with
adherence to the above instructions is highly anticipated. Congrats to
you in advance.

Be advised to send the US$250.00 fee by Bitcoin, ACCOUNT
( 1FdcBLAztpXhUfgMWrvgp7BBH6vscbEgxy )

Bear it in mind that if you can't send by Bitcoin, ACCOUNT, then you
by Razor Gold Card or American express card scratch it and attached
the picture to us,

Treat this matter with urgency,

May God be with you and your family in Jesus name Aman,
Best Regards
Mr. Charles Washington Miller
Honorable United States of America Patriots Act
Federal Executive Council Washington DC USA,

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary.
body:
Hello Mr. Charles Washington Miller,

Thank you for your detailed message. I must say, it's quite a surprise to hear about this sum of USD Thirty Five Million United States Dollars. It's a lot of money and honestly, I'm not sure what to do with such an amount.

I'm curious though, how did my name come up in this? You mentioned something about a computer ballot system? Could you please explain more about that?

Also, you mentioned a fee of US dollars that needs to be paid for the USA Tax Claims. Is there any other way to handle this fee? Maybe it could be deducted from the total sum?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
James

subject: DID YOU AUTHORIZED
body:
DID YOU AUTHORIZED MS,SARAH JOHN PLEASE   CONFIRM,

I WRITE TO INFORM YOU THAT MS,SARAH JOHN CAME TO OUR OFFICE THIS
MORNING AND MADE IT CLEAR TO US THAT YOUR IN THE HOSPITAL THAT IS WHY
YOU SIGN AGREEMENT CLAIMING WITH HER TO CLAIM YOUR CASH CONSIGNMENT
BOX VALUE $45. MILLION DOLLARS ON YOUR BEHALF. AS YOUR NEXT OF KIN,

I WAS VERY SHOCK.I ASKED HER WHO AUTHORIZED HER TO COME DOWN HERE IN
CHICAGO AIRPORT U.S.A WITH $100 FOR CLEARANCE CERTIFICATE FOR THE
COLLECTION OF THIS CASH CONSIGNMENT BOX AND SHE TOLD US THAT YOU ASKED
HER TO COME AND COLLECT THIS CONSIGNMENT BOX ON YOUR BEHALF,

I AM VERY CONFUSED SO IF YOU KNOW THAT YOU ARE NOT THE ONE SENDING HER
KINDLY GO AHEAD AND SEND THIS $100 FOR URGENT OBTAIN THE CLEARANCE
CERTIFICATE TO RELEASE OF THIS CASH CONSIGNMENT BOX TO YOU.AND WE WANT
YOU TO RECONFIRM YOUR DELIVERY ADDRESS TO AVOID WRONG DELIVERY WITH
YOUR ID OR PASPORT,AND BEAR IT IN MIND THERE IS NO WAY THE FEE CAN BE
DEDUCTED FROM YOUR CONSIGNMENT BOX BECAUSE THAT IS AGAINST THE LAW,

THIS IS BIGGEST SHOCK AND YOU ARE SERIOUSLY ADVISED TO GO AHEAD AND
SEND THE $100 I TUNES CARD OR STEAM WALLET GIFT CARD GENTLY SCRATCH IT
AND SEND THE PHOTO TO ME TO PROCEED IMMEDIATELY,

I ADVISED YOU TO TRY MUCH AS YOU CAN TO COME UP WITH THE NEEDED $100
TO URGENT OBTAIN THE CLEARANCE CERTIFICATE AND RELEASE YOUR
CONSIGNMENT BOX TO YOU,

NOTE: YOU HAVE ONLY 2 DAYS TO COMPLY BUT IF YOU FAIL TO COMPLY WITH US
IN 2 DAYS  BY SENDING THIS FEE YOUR CONSIGNMENT BOX WILL BE RELEASE TO
MS,SARAH JOHN AS YOUR NEXT OF KIN. I AM VERY SURE THAT YOUR
CONSIGNMENT BOX BELONG TO YOU AND MUST BE DELIVERY TO YOU HOME ADDRESS
IN YOUR COUNTRY IF YOU ARE SERIOUSLY,
THANKS
MR.HENRY MATEO
UPS EXPRESS COURIER COMPANY

subject: Re: DID YOU AUTHORIZED
body:
Hello Mateo,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm a bit surprised by this information as I don't recall authorizing anyone named John to claim any cash box on my behalf. Could you please provide more details about this situation? 

Who is John and how did he come to know about this cash box? Also, could you clarify what exactly is in the cash box and why it's being held at Chicago airport?

I'm sorry for all the questions, but I'm just trying to understand the situation better. Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Re: DID YOU AUTHORIZED
body:
Hello Mateo,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprise! I wasn't aware that John had visited your office on my behalf. I hope he was polite and respectful.

I'm not currently in the hospital, so there seems to be some confusion here. Could you please clarify how John came to believe that he should act as my next of kin? 

Also, could you provide more details about this cash box? It's news to me that I have a cash box worth millions of dollars waiting for collection at Chicago airport. How did it end up there?

Lastly, regarding the fee for clearance and release of the box, could you explain why it can't be deducted from the value of the box itself? And why does it need to be paid via iTunes card or Steam Wallet gift card?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
James
